item.description:
Our first meetup of 2011 will be at Hunt's Photo meeting room (100 MainStreet, Melrose, MA 02176) on Jan 8, 2011 from 3:00 PM to 5:00 PM. At this meeting we will focus on the basic headshot portrait photography using a low cost studio lighting set that is currently provided on the market, will also go over the custom setup white balance using the "gray card" and the "ExpoDisc". I will try to look for a model for this basic headshot unless one of our group members volunteers to be this model.

Notes:
. See notes on how to set your camera to use a Gray Card or ExpoDisc (The notes is located in the More->Files tab on the Meetup page).

. A suggestion of $5.00 donation to cover the cost.
item.name: Our first BPP meetup in 2011
